TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidatingPropertiesEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为事件创建事件处理程序， 以自定义配置文件属性值的验证方式。You create an event handler for the event to customize how profile property values are validated. 为用户设置配置文件属性时引发事件。The event is raised when profile properties are set for a user. 如果任何属性值验证失败，请将它们添加到属性中的集合 。If any property values fail validation, add them to the collection in the property. 方法返回属性中的集合， 以便您可以确定哪些属性验证失败。The method returns the collection in the property so that you can determine which properties failed validation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 如果为属性传递的值为 `FirstName` 空或 `null` ，则将 `FirstName` 属性添加到 集合中。When the value passed for `FirstName` property is empty or `null`, the `FirstName` property is added to the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含未通过验证的配置文件属性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection that contains profile properties that have failed validation.

value.span: 未通过验证的配置文件属性。

span.span: The profile properties that have failed validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含未通过验证的属性的名称集合。The property contains a collection of the names of the properties that have failed validation. 如果为事件创建事件处理程序 ，则可以将未通过验证的属性的名称添加到属性中的集合 。If you create an event handler for the event, you add the names of the properties that fail validation to the collection in the property. 方法返回属性中的集合， 以便您可以确定哪些属性验证失败。The method returns the collection in the property so that you can determine which properties failed validation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 如果为属性传递的值为 `FirstName` 空或 `null` ，则将 `FirstName` 属性添加到 集合中。When the value passed for `FirstName` property is empty or `null`, the `FirstName` property is added to the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]

summary.span: 获取要验证的配置文件属性的名称和值的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of names and values of the profile properties to validate.

value.span: 要验证的配置文件属性的名称和值。

span.span: The names and values of the profile properties to validate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个 对象，该对象包含要为用户设置的配置文件属性的名称和值。The property returns an object that contains the names and values of the profile properties to set for the user. 如果为事件创建事件处理程序 ，则可以从属性中检索要验证的属性 。If you create an event handler for the event, you can retrieve the properties to validate from the property. 如果任何值验证失败，请将它们添加到 属性。If any values fail validation, add them to the property. 方法返回属性中的集合， 以便您可以确定哪些属性验证失败。The method returns the collection in the property so that you can determine which properties failed validation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序 。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 如果为属性传递的值为 `FirstName` 空或 `null` ，则将 `FirstName` 属性添加到 集合中。When the value passed for `FirstName` property is empty or `null`, the `FirstName` property is added to the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ApplicationServices.ProfileService/vb/Global.asax#1)]
